remarks: Subspace union is a subset of subspace join.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
djhunss.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djhunss.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhunss.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
djhunss.j $e |- .\/ = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhunss.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
djhunss.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) $.
djhunss.y $e |- ( ph -> Y C_ V ) $.
djhunssN $p |- ( ph -> ( X u. Y ) C_ ( X .\/ Y ) ) $.
